attributes.action: Show  episode of mason (coronation street) death due to knife crime in schools
attributes.additional_details: I want the government to help with getting this done knife crime has rose in the last 10 years in England and Wales it's time to make a change
attributes.background: This episode highlights not only the dangers and outcome of what happens when carrying a knife or sharp object it shows how it effects everyone around the crime. It is relatable to young children and could make a great impact on knife crime in communities

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

We understand that you are concerned about knife crime, but decisions about what programmes to show to students are a matter for teachers, not the UK Government or Parliament.
